name: Underwater Love Story
description:
Crab Marian and shrimp Marianna were kidnapped and imprisoned on a submarine by bad people who want to eat them. They need to get rid of it, helping each other.

This game was made by my team for Global Game Jame 2015 GGJ2015

Web version: WEB VERSION

Controls:

Player 1:

W/A/S/D

Player 2:

ARROWS

Play with sound
